entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
